nodes.text: The loralora bird was a species of bird hybrid from the moon of Ketz. One loralora bird was for sale in Bina's Creature Stall in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, and was set free when Julen Rakab unlocked the stall's cages to prevent Delta Jeet from finding him and Izal Garsea. The loralora bird followed Garsea, and Rakab named it Lucky.
